body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Inked Expressions Tattoo Parlor. My name is David Murphy. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: This is Joyce Harris. I'm really angry about the customer service I received yesterday.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm very sorry to hear that, Joyce. Let me help you resolve this. Could you please provide me with your appointment reference number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, thank you. Can you also confirm the time of your appointment?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It was at three zero zero PM.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joyce. Can you please describe the specific issues you faced with our customer service?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The staff was incredibly rude, and they kept me waiting for over an hour without any explanation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced, Joyce. I will take this up with the management and ensure such incidents do not happen in the future. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Joyce. We appreciate your patience and understanding. Thank you for calling Inked Expressions Tattoo Parlor. Have a great day!
